title.rendered: Spring Nurture: Body Scrub + Sodashi Facial with Gua Sha

excerpt.rendered:
Vanilla Bliss Scrub + Instant Glow Facial + Gua Sha Facial Massage

Reconnect to self, and renew from top to toe for spring with this beautifully nurturing spa journey.

Rejuvenate skin tone and soothe the senses with a full body Sodashi exfoliation. Warm botanical oils are massaged into the skin followed by a vanilla and sandalwood exfoliant to buff away dry skin and melt away tension. A warm shower followed by a hydrating application of antioxidant-rich vanilla body cream deeply nourishes to leave skin glowing.

Next, a Sodashi Instant Glow Facial with Gua Sha facial massage, customised to your exact skin type , boosts skin radiance, brightens and hydrates.

An ancient Chinese purification technique, gentle gliding pressure with the Gua Sha stimulates lymph nodes to reduce fluid retention and detoxify for clearer more radiant skin.

Safe for mums-to-be.

Available until 30 November 2022.
